name: Gamers Vs Furries Alpha
description:
Gamers Vs Furries captures the events of World War III, the war currently going on between the Gamers and the Furries. This single player game will feature 80 unlockable characters that you can play as to defeat the furries, unlock more characters, upgrade characters, and win the war!

If you want to contribute resources, you can help make the game!

https://discord.gg/YqWtF7U

https://www.patreon.com/bonzane/overview

Works only on Windows

----UPDATE LOG----

Version 0.5 Features:

-The Game is now Public!

-New 'Settings' Menu

-Improved Saving and Loading, Credits, etc

-Included Discord and Patreon links

-More characters are capable of doing damage!

Version 0.4 Features:

-7 New characters

     Flamer, Zooker, Mobster, Ninja, Operator, Archer, Mad Scientist, Howard

-Two New character rarities

-Saving and Loading

-More Developer Tools

-Test Dummies

-Characters do damage now

-Adjustable Blood level 

-New and Improved Character selection screen

-Credits (Draft)

Notes: I am aware that when selecting Howard the wrong character appears on the bottom, don't worry you will still spawn as Howard.  Also, 'Ninja' is not completely done. The small plus button will add 1 flamer and 1 soldier,  but will not unlock them. The Pirate shop button MIGHT still look like trash. Please report other bugs to the discord server. 

Version 0.3: Includes: 

30 characters (default + 3 shop unlock + 26 random unlock)

Dev tools (Unlock all and Add Cash)

Upgrading System (All random unlock characters can be upgrades [Middle Mouse])
